find_balance: finding balance in your entrepreneurial journey.
about_us_content_1: Entrepreneurial Mindfulness is a website with an instrument that measures the capability to focus and be mindful about things that are important in the process of becoming and being an entrepreneur.
about_us_content_2: The Entrepreneurial Mindfulness instrument was developed by the Edutech Research Interest Group (RIG) through BINUS University International Grant, collaborating with various institutions from Indonesia and Malaysia:
about_us_content_3: We hope this instrument can help you find balance in your entrepreneurial journey.
sorry_forgot_password: We're sorry to hear that you forgot your password.
instructions_forgot_password: Simply input your email. Then, input your new password and finally you can browse our website again in no time!
test_note: Note: This questionnaire is best done on a computer.
fllling_instructions_details: Based on your general opinion about yourself, give a score for each statement. Your choice should consider the statements on the left or right. If you feel that you’re in the middle, you can choose the middle score (4).
deactivate_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account?
deactivate_account_confirmation_2: You can reactivate your account at any time by visiting the login page. To proceed with deactivate account, enter your password
have_any_questions: Have any questions? Email us at: admin@entrepreneurialmindfulness.web.id
not_format_email: Field %s must be in email format.
not_same: Field %s is not the same as %s
test_tutorial_explanation: Based on your general opinion about yourself, give a score for each statement. Your choice should consider the statements on the left or right. If you feel that you’re in the middle, you can choose the middle score (4).
success_submit: Successfully submit the answer! Let's see your results!
failed_submit: Failed to submit your answer! Please try again!
page-not-found-1: It looks like that you lost. Please try again by navigating from the header link!
page-not-found-2: Also, it may be possible that you're trying to access forbidden page.
not_performed_test: You haven't performed entreprenurial mindfulness test yet! Please try taking the test first and submit it!
duplicate_username_email: Email is already taken! Please try with different email!
unanswered_questions_numbers: You haven't answered these questions yet:
authentication_fill_in: You must fill in authentication code to continue using your application!
email_check_auth: Please check your email to check your authentication code and enter 4 digit of authentication code.
no_inactivate_account: We can't find your inactivated account.
unknown_error_occured: Unknown error occured! Please try again!
verify_account_reminder: Make sure to verify your account by inputting OTP code from the email we sent to you!
